title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1672/93 of 29 June 1993 extending Regulation (EEC) No 695/93 adopting safeguard measures applicable to the placing in free circulation of fishery products landed in the Community by fishing vessels from third countries
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1672/93 of 29 June 1993 extending Regulation (EEC) No 695/93 adopting safeguard measures applicable to the placing in free circulation of fishery products landed in the Community by fishing vessels from third  countries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Regulation (EEC) No 695/93 is hereby amended as follows: in Article 5, '30 June 1993' is replaced by '30 September 1993.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 June 1993.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 76, 30. 3. 1993, p. 12.
(3) OJ No L 73, 26. 3. 1993, p. 36.
